attributes.action: Don't give the right to sex offenders to come off the sex register
attributes.background: Why should we as a society give pedophiles the right to appeal against coming off the sex offender after 15yrs, their victims, their families have to live the trauma for life, the victims are victims for life! Help me stop this from happening, help secure your children's future

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There isn't a right to be removed from the sex offenders register after 15 years. After 15 years, someone can apply to be removed, but it is not an automatic right. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
